NutStyles¶

This is the collection of GUIStyle properties I use to create my custom editors. Most are minor things, slightly adjusted to match what I consider ideal UI rules.

STYLES¶

BigHeader

Generates text with fontSize set to 24.

Header

Generates text with fontSize set to 18.

GrayHeader

Generates gray text with fontSize set to 14.

GET HELP¶

Join this Discord server to get help, suggest new features, and vote on future updates!
